Comment: I ran some chat GTP analysis so take it with grain of salt.  This has got to be one of his all time dumbest brain fart ideas.   # Conclusion  Maintaining Alcatraz as a **tourist attraction** is economically advantageous, yielding **$4.1 billion to $6.3 billion more** in economic benefits over the next 20 years compared to rebuilding it as a prison.  Given the significant **financial return** from tourism, coupled with **cultural and educational value**, the most beneficial option for both **San Francisco** and **the public** is to preserve Alcatraz as a **tourist destination**.
